name: Five Nights at Plofy's
description:
This is a prototype.
I am working on the full version and the Spanish version.
The full version will have more activities to do at night, more places, animatronics and jumpscares.
This game is made in PowerPoint but it's decent,
If you find bugs let me know in the comments.
There are some visual errors, for example, the eye color of animatronics changes ...
I am fixing those errors.
This game is inspired by Scott Cawton's "Five Nights at Freddy" franchise. Are you ready to leave everything right before the opening?
